actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to provide that any bank or depository institution situated in a standard metropolitan statistical area must invest 25 percent of its mortgage portfolio in loans secured by real property situated in inner cities located within the standard metropolitan statistical area in which the depository institution is situated.

summary.text: Requires that any bank or depository institution situated in a standard metropolitan statistical area must invest 25 percent of its mortgage portfolio in loans secured by real property situated in inner cities located within the standard metropolitan statistical area in which the depository institution is situated.

titles.title: A bill to provide that any bank or depository institution situated in a standard metropolitan statistical area must invest 25 percent of its mortgage portfolio in loans secured by real property situated in inner cities located within the standard metropolitan statistical area in which the depository institution is situated.
